cta.text: We look forward to hearing about your projects and providing you with all the information you need.

accueil.sous_titre: Have a question? Need more information?
accueil.block1_des: An overview of the team and our collaborators
accueil.block2_des: An overview of our know-how and working methods
accueil.block3_des: An overview of our recent achievements and the operations we have handled

equipe.description: Graduated from Arts & Métiers ParisTech in 1998, with a postgraduate degree in Fluid Mechanics in 1998 and a Master's degree in Entrepreneurship from Grenoble EM in 1999.
equipe.description_suite: Mergers and acquisitions since 1999: Financière de Courcelles (1999-2007), Trianon Corporate Finance (2007-2010), Creation of DLEA Finance in 2010. Advised about fifty transactions.
equipe.more: Since 2017, DLEA Finance has entered a partnership with Mahé Finance, with which it carries out a significant part of its advisory operations. Mahé Finance is led by Hubert Leclercq, former president of Financière de Courcelles.

savoir_faire.cession: Tasks symmetrical to those of acquisition operations, on the side of the selling shareholders, also including production of all the information documents of the transaction (info-memos, teasers, BP).

realisations.description: Over the past 5 years, DLEA Finance, in association with Mahé Finance, has advised:
realisations.element1_titre: Transactions as advisors to selling shareholders.
realisations.element1_des: Companies with a turnover of between €2 million and €30 million
realisations.element2_titre: Transactions as advisors to a buyer.
realisations.element2_des: Companies with a turnover of between €5 million and €50 million
realisations.element3_des: Companies between €10 and €300 million in turnover
realisations.element4_des: Companies with a turnover of more than €200 million

contact.description: We look forward to hearing about your projects and providing you with any information you may require. Our e-mail address is contact@dleafinance.fr or you can contact us using the form below:
